# zenduty_services (Data Source)

```hcl 

data "zenduty_user" "exampleuser" {
    email = ""
}

```

```hcl
output "user" {
  value = data.zenduty_user.exampleuser.users[0]
}

```


## Argument Reference
* `email`(Required) - Emailid of the user to query.





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

### Required

- **email** (String)
